channel.title: Compiled HTML + Rs Tutorial Project
channel.description:
not sure if this is the right section becuase im asking for help finding a program rather then with html if it is wrong please move it thanks,
right i can code up basic websites and layout but im a little stuck on compiling them into .chm or win32 help files i thought it would be a good idea to bash aload of rs tutorials to gether so if mopar goes offline for a little everyone has a basic ebook with tonnes of tutorials to keep them going and before noobs can post help with this or w/e they should look though the ebook.. so in basic terms has anyone got a program or know of a program thats easy to use to compile chm or win32 help files[br][size=1]Posted at: August 09, 2006, 06:30:54 AM[/size][hr]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : Result : --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Found a soulution to my own problem after hours and hours of surfin :
attachment ::
- a pdf file , acrobat reader ebook demostrationg what a compiled html file is how to create it etc
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : Project Agreement : --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- as a result of my findings i have decided to make a chm book that will contain loads and loads of runescape tutorials for help with private servers all credit will be given to authors and authors asked if they wish to donnate their tutorails or code to this project, no code or tutorial will be taken or used with out the authors written permission in the form of an email or private message or forum post. in agreement to this you allow me to edit/modify your work and submit into my project as i see fit but give credit where due. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All authors wishing to donate or agree to this please post here thanks hopefully this project will help out a lot of people once finished

item.title: Compiled HTML + Rs Tutorial Project
item.dc:creator: @protocol protocol
item.description:
@protocol wrote:

WE NEED A TUTORIAL : its ok saying we need one but if no authors sign up then nothing will happen, i rasied this idea in hopes of stopping all the noobs asking about this that and the other, so if we had a ebook they could go to 1st

also as i have said above my java skills are not amazing so help on this would be great

@protocol wrote:

i would be willing to do this if others also would like to help, thus making it the ultimate resouce book to point to before people asking or making threads saves a lot of effort if you got a book you can just search and boom tutorial for adding npc’s comes up or w/e you were searching for i know it would take a lot of work but if a few people were involved it wouldnt be too much work for all of us…
